description.ko: 지구 표면의 시각적 탐구로, 조감도 시점에서 바라본 지질학적 형성물의 가공되지 않은 복합적인 아름다움을 포착합니다.
description.en: A stunning visual exploration of the Earth's surface, capturing the raw and complex beauty of geological formations from a bird's-eye perspective.

prompt: High-resolution satellite view of diverse Earth textures, aerial macro photography of cracked salt flats, deep orange Saharan sand dunes, and vibrant turquoise mineral veins, intricate geological patterns, hyper-realistic details, cinematic natural lighting, 8k resolution.
